howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.description: Rolling Balls Space Race is an exciting space racing game where players control a ball traveling on glowing tracks. Use arrow keys or WASD to control the ball's movement, and space bar to jump.

tips.title: Game Tips
tips.tip1: Time your jumps perfectly to avoid obstacles
tips.tip2: Collect energy boosters on the track to increase speed
tips.tip3: Pay attention to curves on the path and adjust direction in advance
tips.tip4: Don't ignore special rewards on side tracks
tips.tip5: Maintain high speed on straightaways whenever possible

controller.title: Controller Support
controller.description: This game supports keyboard and gamepad controls. Using a gamepad can provide a smoother gaming experience, especially in high-speed race segments.

goal.question: What is the goal of the game?
goal.answer: The goal of the game is to control your ball to complete the track as quickly as possible, avoiding obstacles, collecting energy boosters, and reaching the finish line in the shortest time. Each level has different challenges and terrain.

tracks.question: How do I unlock new tracks?
tracks.answer: New tracks will automatically unlock after completing the current track and meeting specified time requirements. Some special tracks require collecting a specific number of stars to unlock.

mobile.question: Can I play on mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Yes, Rolling Balls Space Race is fully optimized for mobile devices. On touchscreens, swipe left and right to control direction, and tap the screen to jump. The gaming experience is smooth across all devices.

multiplayer.question: Does the game have multiplayer mode?
multiplayer.answer: Currently, the game primarily offers single-player challenge mode, but you can compare scores with friends through time trials. The development team is considering adding real-time multiplayer competition features in future versions.
